New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 4 for 22 in his four overs
Key Match Events: Shakib Al Hasan was adjudged lbw on field, and upheld on DRS
Taskin Ahmed overstepped, giving Pakistan a free-hit
Mohammad Haris whacked the free-hit for six
Pre-Game Insights: The odds were piling up against Pakistan, but they managed to pull off an unexpected win
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan put on their first fifty partnership of this T20 World Cup
Pakistan will travel to Sydney for the semi-finals if India beat Zimbabwe in the last group game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Adelaide pitch wasn't great for strokeplay, with a strike rate of 122 when pace was on and 28 when pace was off
Pakistan's win gave Netherlands a great chance of finishing fourth in Group 2
